com.j2speed.async
Interface ResponseHandler<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the value.
All Superinterfaces:
ExceptionHandler
All Known Implementing Classes:
AsyncResponse, ResponseAdapter
public interface ResponseHandler<T>
extends ExceptionHandler

It handles the value received as a result of the execution of an asynchronous Request .

Author:
Alex Nistico <alienisty(at)gmail.com>

Method Summary
 void onResponse(Result<T> value)
          Handles the result asynchronously passed in by the corresponding Request.
 
Methods inherited from interface com.j2speed.async.ExceptionHandler
onException, onFinally
 

Method Detail

onResponse

void onResponse(@NonNull
                Result<T> value)
Handles the result asynchronously passed in by the corresponding Request.

This method supports the @RunOn annotation that causes the runner to call-back this method on the EDT.

Parameters:
value - the result produced by the corresponding Request.
